tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE FakeNewsMonitoring (
id INT,
news_title VARCHAR(255),
media_channel VARCHAR(100),
reported_date DATE,
source_url TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE news_articles (
    article_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    article_title TEXT,
    article_content TEXT,
    publication_date DATE,
    media_source TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE misinformation_reports (
    report_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    article_id INT,
    report_date DATE,
    report_description TEXT,
    reporter_name TEXT,
    FOREIGN KEY (article_id) REFERENCES news_articles(article_id)
);

CREATE TABLE news_article (
  article_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  article_title VARCHAR(255),
  published_date DATE,
  author VARCHAR(100),
  channel_id INT,
  FOREIGN KEY (channel_id) REFERENCES media_channel(channel_id)
);

CREATE TABLE misinformation_report (
  report_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  reported_article_id INT,
  report_datetime TIMESTAMP,
  report_reason VARCHAR(255),
  FOREIGN KEY (reported_article_id) REFERENCES news_article(article_id)
);

CREATE TABLE fake_news (
    news_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    news_title VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    news_content TEXT NOT NULL,
    publish_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE media_channels (
    channel_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    channel_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    channel_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    channel_country VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE news_sources (
    source_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    source_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    source_type VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE news_mentions (
    mention_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    news_id INT,
    source_id INT,
    channel_id INT,
    mention_date DATE,
    FOREIGN KEY (news_id) REFERENCES fake_news(news_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (source_id) REFERENCES news_sources(source_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (channel_id) REFERENCES media_channels(channel_id)
)

CREATE TABLE news_outlets (
    outlet_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    outlet_name STRING,
    outlet_type STRING,
    location STRING
)

CREATE TABLE news_articles (
    article_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    article_title STRING,
    article_body TEXT,
    publish_date TIMESTAMP,
    outlet_id UUID REFERENCES news_outlets(outlet_id)
)

CREATE TABLE social_media_users (
    user_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    user_name STRING,
    follower_count INT,
    following_count INT
)

CREATE TABLE social_media_posts (
    post_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    post_content TEXT,
    post_date TIMESTAMP,
    user_id UUID REFERENCES social_media_users(user_id)
)

CREATE TABLE misinformation_reports (
    report_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    report_description TEXT,
    report_date TIMESTAMP,
    article_id UUID REFERENCES news_articles(article_id)
)
